info.title: Cryptagio API
info.description:
# Public & Private methods
Public methods Private methods
No authorization required Authorization required
# Authorization To use private methods, you need to get your access/secret key first (on [cryptagio.com](https://cryptagio.com)). After signed up and verified, visit API Tokens page to get your keys.

All requests to the private methods require these headers:

X-Public-Key Your access key.
X-Tonce Tonce is a timestamp in integer, stands for microseconds elapsed since Unix epoch. Tonce must be within 30 seconds of server's current time. Each tonce can only be used once.
X-Signature Signature of the API request, generated by you, use your secret key.

get.description: Get recent trades on market, each trade is included only once. Trades are sorted in reverse creation order.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of returned trades.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: If set, returned orders will be sorted in specific order.

parameters.name: from_time
parameters.description: Filter trades by time. An integer represents the seconds elapsed since Unix epoch. If set, only data after that time will be returned.

parameters.name: to_time
parameters.description: Filter trades by time. An integer represents the seconds elapsed since Unix epoch. If set, only data before that time will be returned.

parameters.name: from_uuid
parameters.description: Filter trades by id. If set, only trades created after the trade will be returned.

parameters.name: market
parameters.description: Filter trades by market. It's always in the form of xxxyyy, where xxx is the base currency code, yyy is the quote currency code.

post.description: Accepts an array of JSON objects.
Accepts JSON object. Cancels all orders if no parameters are passed.
